tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE sales_funnel_stage (
    stage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stage_name VARCHAR(50),
    conversion_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE sales_funnel_stage1 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    product_id INT,
    conversion_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_funnel_stage2 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    product_id INT,
    conversion_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_funnel_stage3 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    product_id INT,
    conversion_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE sales_funnel_stage4 (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    product_id INT,
    conversion_status VARCHAR(20)
);
